text: Wood Moy (10 June 1918 - 8 November 2017) was a Chinese-born American actor. He was born in Guangzhou, China, but raised in New York City. He was known for his role as Jo in the movie Chan Is Missing (1982). He also appeared in Howard the Duck (1986), Class Action (1991) and as Mr. Lee in Final Analysis (1992). Moy died in New York City on 8 November 2017 of pneumonia at the age of 99.Wood Moy ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1918 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Disease-related deaths in New York City Category:Chinese movie actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Wood Moy
